aimy.enableExtension.description: Enable/disable the AimY extension auto-start behavior.

aimy.gameVisualMode.description: Choose between 2D (flat targets) or 3D (targets with depth and perspective) aiming modes.

aimy.idleTimer.description: Idle delay in milliseconds before the game auto-starts.

aimy.difficulty.description: Choose a difficulty preset or 'Custom' to use your own settings.

aimy.targetGoals.description: Number of targets to hit to complete the game.

aimy.targetTimeExists.description: How long (ms) a target exists before counting as a miss. Set 0 to disable.

aimy.gameMode.description: Game mode: Target Rush (classic), Time Frenzy (fixed time, score targets), Hydra Targets (3 simultaneous targets, fixed time or fixed target count).

aimy.timeFrenzyDuration.description: Duration in ms for Time Frenzy mode.

aimy.hydraMode.description: Hydra Targets end condition: 'Target Count' (hit X targets to win) or 'Timed' (hit as many as possible in Y seconds). Applies only when gameMode = 'Hydra Targets'.

aimy.hydraTargetCount.description: Total targets to spawn for Hydra Targets when using target-count mode.

aimy.hydraTotalTime.description: Total time in ms for Hydra Targets when using timed mode.

aimy.enableSoundEffects.description: Enable/disable hit/miss sound effects in the game.

aimy.enableEffects.description: Enable visual effects like particles and hit/miss animations.

aimy.enableStatsSave.description: Enable/disable saving game stats to files.

aimy.statsFormat.description: Format to save stats: 'json' = one file per run, 'csv' = append rows to aimy-stats.csv.

aimy.statsDirectory.description: Directory where AimY saves stats JSON files. Leave empty to use the extension storage folder.

aimy.closeWorkspaceOnGameStart.description: Close all open editors when the game starts and restore them after completion. Dirty (unsaved) editors are not closed to avoid save prompts.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
